title: Fungible compensatory area admissible under Regulation No
clause_text: Fungible compensatory area admissible under Regulation No. 31(3)on the existing authorised BUA shall be without charging premium and over the incentive additional BUA by charging of premium.
section: 33(7)(B) Additional FSI for Redevelopment of existing residential housing societies excluding buildings covered under regulation 33(7) and 33(7)(A):

source_pdf.text_snippet: Fungible compensatory area admissible under Regulation No. 31(3)on the existing authorised BUA shall be without charging premium and over the incentive additional BUA by charging of premium.
